name: Dolphin Game (Bad at Names Sorry)
description:
Hi there, this here is a game about a dolphin.  He's currently trying to protect his friend from spooky shelled invaders! Take out as many as you can!

The idea here is a game that takes place in water WITHOUT sluggish controls. lol.

CONTROLS:
In this game you move automatically...

&& Change the angle you swim at.

Shoot!

Flip! 

Speed Up!

NOTE: You reload your ammo by jumping out of the water!

Have fun and stay safe.
